channel.title: Bedtime Stories
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bedtime Stories for an unsettling time
channel.itunes:author: Edward Gomez
channel.description: Bedtime stories read by astronomer Edward Gomez during the CoVid 19 isolation.
channel.itunes:summary: Bedtime stories read by astronomer Edward Gomez. I started reading these for my children and office mates, following self-isolation in March 2020 for Covid19.

item.title: The Singular Story of the Statue
item.itunes:subtitle: Be careful of breaking an ugly, royal statue. It could land you in prison.
item.itunes:author: Norman Hunter
item.itunes:summary: Be careful of breaking an ugly, royal statue. It could land you in prison

item.title: The Sad Story of Henry
item.itunes:subtitle: Henry is an engine who is very proud of his green paint but that gets him in a bit of a pickle.
item.itunes:author: Rev W Awdry
item.itunes:summary: Henry is an engine who is very proud of his green paint but that gets him in a bit of a pickle.

item.title: Zog and the Flying Doctors
item.itunes:subtitle: A dragon, knight and princess make the most unlikely ambulance crew.
item.itunes:author: Julia Donaldson & Axel Scheffler
item.itunes:summary: A dragon, knight and princess make the most unlikely ambulance crew.

item.title: Edward and Gordon
item.itunes:subtitle: A story of two engines, one proud and fast, the other kind and useful.
item.itunes:author: Rev W Awdry
item.itunes:summary: A story of two engines, one proud and fast, the other kind and useful.

item.title: The King Must Be Obeyed
item.itunes:subtitle: If you have an important visitor always make sure you address your orders carefully..
item.itunes:author: Norman Hunter
item.itunes:summary: If you have an important visitor always make sure you address your orders carefully..

item.title: Edward's Day Out
item.itunes:subtitle: Edward the engine finally gets a day out of the shed.
item.itunes:author: Rev W Awdry
item.itunes:summary: Edward the engine finally gets a day out of the shed.

item.title: Zog
item.itunes:subtitle: The tale of a dragon at school, who isn't very good at being a dragon until he has a little help.
item.itunes:author: Julia Donaldson
item.itunes:summary: The tale of a dragon at school, who isn't very good at being a dragon until he has a little help.

item.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
item.itunes:subtitle: There's a strange visitor at the door, and he looks hungry...
item.itunes:author: Judith Kerr
item.itunes:summary: There's a strange visitor at the door, and he looks hungry...

item.title: The Bewitched Breakfast
item.itunes:subtitle: If you boil one egg for 3 minutes, how long should you boil 100 eggs?
item.itunes:author: Norman Hunter
item.itunes:summary: If you boil one egg for 3 minutes, how long should you boil 100 eggs?

item.title: The Unexpected Banquet
item.itunes:subtitle: The Queen of Sundimundee invites a lot of important people to a banquet. She promptly forgets and is forced to improvise in hilarious ways.
item.itunes:author: Norman Hunter
item.itunes:summary: The Queen of Sundimundee invites a lot of important people to a banquet. She promptly forgets and is forced to improvise in hilarious ways.

item.title: The King with the Paper by Norman Hunter
item.itunes:subtitle: The king of Incrediblania is sick in bed but his court make a puppet to meet with visiting dignataries.
item.itunes:author: Norman Hunter
item.itunes:summary: The king of Incrediblania is sick in bed but his court make a puppet to meet with visiting dignataries.
